hits.ip_item_description: GTS IP KHKI FLD KNG BK SW
hits.long_description: Military time features prominently on the dial of the Khaki Field King Auto, underlining the military heritage of this handsome Hamilton. Specially designed protectors ensure the safety of the crown at all times. Long live the king. This model boasts a bold black dial with day & date display at the 12-o-clock position, arabic numerals and three hands. With an extended power reserve of up to 80 hours, the Caliber H-40 is both beautiful and bold. Almost double than market standard, 80 hours power reserve means you can remove your watch on Friday and it will still be ticking on Monday. Finished with a smart black leather strap. This Hamilton watch is water resistant up to 50 metres.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Field King Auto Black Leather Strap Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS AM CLASS DIGITL BW
hits.long_description: In 1970, Hamilton changed the way the world told time with the debut of the Hamilton Pulsar. Fifty years later, the Hamilton PSR celebrates the launch of that revolutionary first digital watch. Today, a hybrid display and a stainless steel case bring this game-changing invention back to the future.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS VENTURA BLK SW
hits.long_description: As a faithful tribute to the original 1957 model, Hamilton dares to defy the ubiquitous round shape of most watches with an angular entry from the Ventura collection. An impressive leather strap with careful stitch detailing holds a triangular case with clear art-deco influences that blend in with the scientific design of the dial. A sensation of atoms expanding are used in place of numerals for a timepiece that owns both the past and present.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Ventura Men's Black Leather Strap Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.

hits.ip_item_description: LDS SS VENTURA BLK LTR SW
hits.long_description: The original Ventura, launched in 1957, made watchmaking history as the world's first electrical, battery powered watch. With its daring and distinctive design, it quickly became an icon and a collector's item. Ventura's latest incarnation is a faithful tribute to the original and mirrors the pioneering shield shaped celebration of Mid-Century Modern design.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS KHAKI NVY GREEN BW
hits.long_description: The Khaki Navy Scuba Auto, with a colourful green dial andco-ordinating bezel, is guaranteed to make a splash. Its precise Swiss-made movement keeps time at the beach or in the ocean, and its eye-catching design adds a fresh, nautical look to any style. A three-hand movement with a date function and boasting a superior power reserve of 80 hours, the H-10 appears with intricate contrasting snail and pearled patterns for the American Classic models it drives and streamlined surfaces for the pilots’ watches.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Navy Scuba Auto Men's Bracelet Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS KHKI PILT BLK SW
hits.long_description: Boasting a distinctive design inspired by a vintage military timepiece crafted for the British Royal Air Force in 1973, the Hamilton Khaki Pilot Pioneer Mechanical men's watch embodies a unique combination of American spirit and Swiss technology. Featuring a rugged grey NATO strap, 36mm stainless steel case, 100 metres water resistance and scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass, along with a Swiss mechanical movement.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Pilot Pioneer Mechanical Men's Strap Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.

hits.ip_item_description: UNI BRNZ KHK FLD 38 BK SW
hits.long_description: The original soldier's watch gets an original upgrade with Hamilton's first-ever bronze case. Each Khaki Field Mechanical Bronze has a unique story that will unfold with each wear as its case develops a distinct patina over time. Powered by Hamilton's exclusive hand-wound H-50 movement, fitted to a titanium case back and matched with a soft brown leather NATO strap, this authentic 38mm favourite celebrates Hamilton's military heritage with an eye towards the future. What story will your field watch tell? The H-50 is an exclusive caliber specifically developed for Hamilton's handwinding watches. The H-50 has an extended power reserve of up to 80 hours, ensuring maximum reliability even when it is not wound for a few days.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Mechanical Bronze Leather Strap Watch
hits.short_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Mechanical Bronze Leather Strap Watch

hits.long_description: The American's classic: the Intra-Matic. hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS KNAVY SCUBA BLK BW
hits.long_description: Luxury meets sport in this aquatic-inspired timepiece designed to be equally at home in a seaside cabana or deep sea exploring. A ceramic bezel, featuring precisely engraved numerals adds high-seas style to this Khaki Navy Scuba Automatic, and protects it from corrosive elements such as sand and saltwater. With a larger 43mm case, increased water resistance to 30 bar (300m) and an extra-legible dial, this Hamilton high performance watch is ready for all your adventures beside, in or under the water.

hits.long_description: This aquatic-inspired Hamilton watch combines luxury with sporting style.A ceramic bezel, featuring precisely engraved numerals adds high-seas style to this Khaki Navy Scuba Automatic, and protects it from corrosive elements such as sand and saltwater. The sleek stainless steel case boasts  a larger 43mm size, and with an increased water resistance to 30 bar (300m) and an extra-legible dial, this high performance watch is ready for all your adventures by, in or under the water.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Navy Scuba Auto Men's Stainless Steel Watch
hits.short_name: Hamilton Khaki Navy Scuba Auto Men's Stainless Steel Watch

short_name.value: Hamilton Khaki Navy Scuba Auto Men's Stainless Steel Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS XWIND BLK BW
hits.long_description: American watch manufacturers Hamilton have been making ground breaking watches since 1892. Leaders in style and design, this striking stainless steel watch features a detailed black chronograph dial. Powered by automatic movement and water resistant up to 100 metres, this Hamilton combines premium function and design.
hits.long_name: Hamiton X-Wind Men's Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton are manufacturers of fine sports watches. Multifunctional and incredibly stylish this watch features multi dial.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS PAN.E DDTE AUT SW
hits.long_description: Go from sporty to smart with this handsome offering from Hamilton. Featuring up to 80 hours power reserve and the option to choose between striped textile or stylish round cut-outs black leather straps. A dynamic watch with a contemporary feel.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Pan Europ Men's Automatic Strap Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton is raising the bar for its Pan Europ family with a brand new, highperformance automatic movement.
hits.short_name: Hamilton Pan Europ Men's Automatic Strap Watch

short_name.value: Hamilton Pan Europ Men's Automatic Strap Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS JAZZOPEN BLU BW
hits.long_description: Hamilton creates a more honest piece that reveals the open heart of the watch, with all of the machinery plain to see. Large numerals and clear indices give the watch its classic charm, with the inner workings of decades of Swiss expertise in watchmaking for precision in timekeeping.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Jazzmaster Open Heart Men's Steel Bracelet Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.
hits.short_name: Hamilton Jazzmaster Open Heart Men's Steel Bracelet Watch

short_name.value: Hamilton Jazzmaster Open Heart Men's Steel Bracelet Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS KHKI AVI BLK SW
hits.long_description: Advanced technology meets sophisticated fashion in the Khaki Aviation Converter. A bi-directional, rotating slide-rule bezel makes critical calculations and conversions with ease; and the most advanced anti-magnetic hairspring alloy yet invented, NivachronTM, ensures precision in any environment. Perfect for the modern pilot or urban jetsetter, the 42mm sleek black dial covers an H-10 automatic movement with 80-hour power reserve. A three-hand movement with a date function and boasting a superior power reserve of 80 hours, the H-10 appears with intricate contrasting snail and pearled patterns for the American Classic models it drives and streamlined surfaces for the pilots’ watches.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Aviation Converter Auto Chrono Men's Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.
hits.short_name: Hamilton Khaki Aviation Converter Auto Chrono Men's Watch

short_name.value: Hamilton Khaki Aviation Converter Auto Chrono Men's Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS TT KHAKI FLD FCRY6 SW
hits.long_description: Mirroring the design the in-game watch gear players wear in Far Cry® 6,  the Khaki Field Titanium Far Cry 6 Limited Edition watch from Hamilton is here to level-up your wristwear. Ready for both virtual and real life adventures, it features a 42mm titanium case, a sleek black dial with red accents, easy-read automatic hands and an 80-hour power reserve. Pulling the look together, it boasts a soft brown leather strap with a vintage-inspired textured finish. This limited edition watch features special packaging including an additional leather strap, strap changing tool and a leather carry case. It’s also water resistant up to 100m, adding an extra splash of function to a seriously impressive timepiece.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Far Cry 6 Limited Edition Men's Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.
hits.short_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Far Cry 6 Limited Edition Men's Watch

short_name.value: Hamilton Khaki Field Far Cry 6 Limited Edition Men's Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS PILOT SSEC BLK SW
hits.long_description: Inspired by the Model 23, a cutting-edge pocket watch used by U.S. soldiers during WWII, the Khaki Pilot Pioneer's distinctive design is a tribute to Hamilton's aviation and military heritage. The sporty yet refined pilot watch retains an indisputably technical feel with its handwinding mechanical movement, bi-directional rotating bezel and prominent winding crown. With its sleek design, this 43mm timepiece is ready to fly
hits.long_name: Hamilton Pilot Pioneer Brown Leather Strap Watch
hits.short_description: BOSS: Practical and stylish accessories; gifts for any occasion.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS IP KHK XWND CAMO SW
hits.long_description: This Hamilton watch was designed with pilots in mind, built for a life of adventure. The Khaki Aviation X-Wind Automatic Chronograph flies through the crosswinds in a bold new guise, with camouflage patterns and new green colour variant extending across the dial, strap and case. Featuring an inner rotating bezel and an anti-magnetic Silicon hairspring, this high-performance piece has assertive combat chic style.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Aviation X-Wind Auro Chrono Green Strap Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS JAZZ WH SKL BLU SW
hits.long_description: Precision and beauty are on display in the Jazzmaster Skeleton. Hamilton's bold design signature is integrated into a cut-out dial that reveals the highly technical internal mechanics of this captivating and unique timepiece. By suppressing the escapement regulator and through the refinement of the kinematic chain from the barrel to the escapement, the H-10-S movement has the capacity to store double the power of comparable standard movements, offering an extended power reserve of up to 80 hours.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Jazzmaster Skeleton Auto Blue Leather Strap Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.

Hamilton's bold design signature is integrated into a cut-out dial that reveals the highly technical internal mechanics of this captivating and unique timepiece. A sleek 40mm stainless steel case houses an anthracite dial with the automatic movement's skeleton displayed in a vintage, timeless manner, protected by sapphire crystal. hits.ip_item_description: GTS TIT FROG GRY BLK SW
hits.long_description: With a massive 46mm case, the Khaki Navy Frogman Titanium is a real ocean giant. Water resistant up to 1,000m, it's built for the depths and to meet the demands of the toughest underwater environment. Made from lightweight but durable titanium and with a practical rubber strap, this is vital safety equipment for ocean explorers. A three-hand movement with a date function and boasting a superior power reserve of 80 hours, the Caliber H-10 automatic movement appears with intricate contrasting snail and pearled patterns for the American Classic models it drives and streamlined surfaces for the pilots’ watches.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Navy Frogman Titanium Auto Rubber Strap Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS TT KHK FLD CHR BLK SW
hits.long_description: Rugged, resilient and precise, the Khaki Field Automatic Chronograph is the perfect timepiece for confident explorers. A special engraving on the case back of this 44mm sandblasted stainless steel field watch pays tribute to Hamilton's military heritage, and SuperLuminova-coated raised numerals add readability and depth to its dial. Paired with a comfortable leather bund strap, this high-performance accessory is made for outdoor adventures.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Men's Green Leather Strap Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.
hits.short_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Men's Green Leather Strap Watch

short_name.value: Hamilton Khaki Field Men's Green Leather Strap Watch

hits.ip_item_description: GTS BPV VENT ELVIS BLK SW
hits.long_description: Dare to be bold with the Ventura Elvis80 Skeleton, an ultra-modern tribute to the past, present and future of the world’s first electric watch. A powerful evolution of a revolutionary timepiece, its precise skeletonized dial features a striking red zigzag at the center of its sleek, black PVD-coated, triangular case. This bolt of energy celebrates an iconic symbol of innovation and draws the eye to the automatic H-10-S movement underneath. By suppressing the escapement regulator and through the refinement of the kinematic chain from the barrel to the escapement, the H-10-S has the capacity to store double the power of comparable standard movements, offering an extended power reserve of up to 80 hours.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Ventura Elvis80 Skeleton Black Rubber Strap Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.
hits.short_name: Hamilton Ventura Elvis80 Skeleton Black Rubber Strap Watch

short_name.value: Hamilton Ventura Elvis80 Skeleton Black Rubber Strap Watch

A powerful evolution of a revolutionary timepiece, its precise skeletonized dial features a striking zigzag at the center to match its luminous rose gold PVD-coated, triangular case. This bolt of energy celebrates an iconic symbol of innovation and draws the eye to the automatic H-10-S movement underneath. By suppressing the escapement regulator and through the refinement of the kinematic chain from the barrel to the escapement, the H-10-S has the capacity to store double the power of comparable standard movements, offering an extended power reserve of up to 80 hours.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS KHKI AV CHR BLK SW
hits.long_description: Advanced technology for the sophisticated aviator. Calculate critical conversions and metrics at a glance with the Khaki Pilot Converter Auto Chrono’s bi-directional, rotating slide-rule bezel. This high-performance tool converts units, such as feet to meters or miles to kilometers, and currency. Add in the H-21-Si automatic chronograph movement with its superior anti-magnetic silicon hairspring and this stylish 44mm pilot’s watch has everything you need for your next adventure in the sky.
hits.long_name: Hamilton Khaki Aviation Converter Auto Chrono Men's Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS INTRA MECH BLK BW
hits.long_description: Feel the emotion at the heart of watchmaking with each wind of the Intra-Matic Chronograph H. Powered by Hamilton's new, exclusive hand-wound chronograph movement, the H-51, this is a timepiece with soul. A box-shaped sapphire crystal with double anti-reflective coating protects the signature panda dial, adding another layer of authentic heritage to this mechanical version of a vintage-inspired favourite. The H-51 is a mechanical chronograph movement that celebrates the fundamental principles of watchmaking. Featuring an extended 60-hour power reserve, this hand-wound caliber keeps and measures time with a combination of modern precision and vintage-inspired charm.
hits.long_name: Hamilton American Classic Intra-Matic Stainless Steel Watch
hits.short_description: Hamilton watches are all about quality, technology and design and are some of the finest watches in the world.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS INTRAMATIC BLU SW
hits.long_description: The Hamilton Intra-Matic automatic chronograph watch is a modern reworking of a 1968 signature piece that offers a sporty yet classic look. Combining authentic 60's appeal with the exclusive H-31 automatic movement, its distinctive two tone blue and white dial is a guaranteed eye-catcher. The classic brown leather strap offers timeless, sophisticated style - perfect for today's gentleman.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS SS INTR GRN DI BRN SW
hits.long_description: With sporty yet classic design and true vintage appeal, the Intra-Matic Automatic Chronograph is sure to catch the eye. A modern take on a 1968 signature Hamilton piece, it features a distinctive panda dial in a fresh colour pairing of light green and white. With a high-quality brown leather strap, you’ll have the ultimate in comfort and style. The H-31 is a powerful automatic chronograph movement featuring an extended 60-hour power reserve, making it perfect for the demands of the sportiest of models. With an H pattern design on the oscillating bridge, there’s no mistaking who made this movement.

hits.ip_item_description: GTS AMERICAN CLASS PSR LE
hits.long_description: Inspired by legendary dystopian thriller The Matrix. This sleek all-black timepiece is constructed from stainless steel and features a green LCD numeral display for a retro-futuristic appearance. Fit for Neo himself, this wristwatch has the film’s instantly recognisable rain pattern inscribed on the case back and comes in unique commemorative packaging. Powered by integrated Quartz movement for expert precision. Limited edition - only 1,999 of this model have ever been produced
